title: SEN Parent Meet Up
description: A short input on various educational or SEN topics and then plenty of time to network with the other mums, sharing advice and empathy over coffee and cake!

title: Workshop
description: Find out how issues with working memory impacts your child's learning and learn strategies to support them.
